sn55.42:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.42:1.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.42:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato.
sn55.42:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro punnabhisanda, kusalabhisanda, sukhassahara.
sn55.42:4.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi punnabhisandehi kusalabhisandehi samannagatassa ariyasavakassa na sukaram punnassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.42:4.3: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahapunnakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati.
sn55.42:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yatthima mahanadiyo samsandanti samenti, seyyathidam—
sn55.42:5.2: ganga, yamuna, aciravati, sarabhu, mahi, tattha na sukaram udakassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.42:5.3: ‘ettakani udakalhakani’ti va ‘ettakani udakalhakasatani’ti va ‘ettakani udakalhakasahassani’ti va ‘ettakani udakalhakasatasahassani’ti vati.
sn55.42:5.4: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahaudakakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati.
sn55.42:5.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, imehi catuhi punnabhisandehi kusalabhisandehi samannagatassa ariyasavakassa na sukaram punnassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.42:5.7: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahapunnakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati”ti.
